title: Employee Management - Bulk Create, Update and Delete
description: Verify that bulk operations for creating, updating, and deleting employees work correctly and maintain data integrity, including Excel import and export.

steps.description: Import a valid Excel file containing multiple new employees
Check that all employees are created in the system with correct details
Update multiple employee records simultaneously via API or UI
Verify updated fields reflect changes accurately with no data loss
Delete a batch of employees using bulk delete functionality
Confirm employees are removed from database and no orphaned data remains
Export the current employee list to Excel
Validate the Excel file format and data matches the system's employee records

title: Shift Planning - Multi-location Shift Creation and Conflict Detection
description: Validate creation of shifts across multiple locations and automatic detection of schedule conflicts with approval workflow.

steps.description: Create shifts on multiple locations with overlapping times
System detects conflicts and notifies the user accordingly
Submit the shift schedule for manager approval
Approval status is tracked and updated correctly post manager decision
Attempt to create shifts that do not conflict
Shifts are saved without warnings and visible in calendar and group views

title: Attendance Tracking - Multi-method Check-in/out and Anomaly Detection
description: Ensure attendance can be recorded via manual entry, QR code scanning, and automated anomaly detection functions as expected.

steps.description: Record attendance through manual entry in the system
Attendance record is accurately stored with correct timestamps
Scan QR code to check-in and then check-out using the QR Code Signature System
QR code entry validates token, captures GPS and timestamps correctly
Simulate irregular attendance patterns triggering anomaly detection
System flags anomalies and notifies supervisors or administrators
Verify overtime is automatically calculated when employee exceeds shift duration
Overtime hours are recorded and displayed correctly in attendance reports

title: Annual Leave Management - Accurate Calculation and Carry-over
description: Test that annual leave system correctly calculates entitlements and carry-over compliant with labor laws with accurate usage tracking.

steps.description: Grant annual leave to employees based on start date and labor law rules
Leave balances are calculated correctly and displayed properly
Approve and record usage of annual leave
Leave balances are decremented correctly and updated in real-time
Simulate year-end to verify leave carry-over logic
Unutilized leave is carried over up to allowed limit and expiry rules enforced

title: Job Application Workflow - Multi-step Form with CV Upload and HR Panel Review
description: Validate public job application form with all seven sections, CV upload functionality, and that HR can securely access, review, and update application statuses.

steps.description: Complete public job application form filling all 7 sections
Upload CV document during submission
Form submission is accepted only if all required fields and CV are present and valid
HR logs into secure panel and views submitted applications
Submitted data, including CV, is displayed correctly and download link functions
HR updates application status and adds notes
Status updates persist and trigger expected notifications

title: Real-time Dashboard Metrics Update and Display
description: Check that dashboard metrics, graphs, KPIs, and notifications update accurately and in real-time reflecting current personnel and system status.

steps.description: Perform multiple operations altering employee statuses, shifts, and notifications
Dashboard metrics and charts reflect these changes promptly without stale data
Trigger system notifications and observe dashboard notification counts
Notifications display with correct priority and update dynamically

title: Calendar System - Drag & Drop Events with Filtering and Mobile Optimization
description: Ensure calendar view supports drag and drop of shifts, leaves and events, filtering by categories, and usability on mobile devices.

steps.description: Create multiple calendar events (shifts, leaves)
Drag and drop events to new dates/times
Events update accordingly in backend and UI reflects changes
Apply filters to display specific event types
Calendar shows filtered results correctly
Access calendar on mobile device or simulate mobile viewport
UI remains responsive and fully functional on different screen sizes

title: System Notifications - Priority Delivery and Read Status Management
description: Test notification system delivers alerts with correct priority, allows marking as read/unread, and filters notifications by priority and status.

steps.description: Generate notifications with varying priority levels
Notifications received with correct priority visual indicators
Mark some notifications as read and others as unread
Read/unread status updates persist and reflect correctly
Use filters to show notifications by priority and read/unread status
Filtered views display only matching notifications

title: Excel Import/Export - Large Dataset Handling with Format and Data Integrity
description: Validate Excel import and export handle large datasets (1000+ records) without data loss, maintaining proper format and data integrity.

steps.description: Import an Excel file with a large dataset (1000+ employees)
All records are imported correctly and no data corruption occurs
Export data (e.g., employees, shifts) as Excel file
Exported file maintains format and all records are present

title: AI Analysis - Gemini AI Data Consistency and Similarity Detection
description: Test AI analysis accurately identifies naming similarities and data inconsistencies with actionable feedback despite API usage rate limitations.

steps.description: Trigger AI analysis on employee and attendance datasets
AI reports naming similarities and data inconsistencies correctly
Simulate API limit reached scenario
System handles API usage limits gracefully and queues or delays analysis jobs without failure

title: Security - JWT Authentication, Password Hashing, and RBAC Enforcement
description: Ensure that access to protected routes requires valid JWT tokens, password hashing is enforced on user credentials, and role-based access control functions correctly.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid and invalid credentials
Valid logins return JWT tokens; invalid logins return proper errors
Verify stored passwords are hashed and not stored in plain text
Password hashes use bcryptjs and cannot be reversed easily
Access protected API endpoints without token or with invalid token
System denies access with appropriate 401 Unauthorized status
Test access control by role to confirm users cannot access unauthorized resources
Access is granted or denied correctly according to user role and permissions

title: Performance - Caching, Indexing, and Lazy Loading under Load
description: Validate system performance optimizations through Redis caching, database indexing, and lazy loading in both normal and peak usage conditions.

steps.description: Measure response times for frequently accessed API endpoints with caching enabled
Responses are delivered within acceptable time limits and caching reduces DB load
Perform queries on large datasets and verify database index usage
Queries execute efficiently without unnecessary full collection scans
Scroll or paginate large UI lists utilizing lazy loading
Additional data loads incrementally without freezing the UI
Simulate peak concurrent users and test system responsiveness
System maintains stability and acceptable performance without timeouts

title: API Validation and Error Handling on Secure and Public Routes
description: Verify all APIs respond with correct status codes, validate inputs, and handle errors gracefully on both protected (JWT) routes and public endpoints.

steps.description: Call protected API endpoints with missing or invalid payloads
API returns 400 Bad Request with descriptive error messages
Call protected API endpoints without JWT token
API returns 401 Unauthorized status
Call public routes like job application submission with valid and invalid inputs
Public API validates inputs and returns proper success or error responses
Trigger unexpected server errors (e.g. DB down) and observe API behavior
Error responses include appropriate status codes and messages without leaking sensitive details
